title: Verdana Language support?
content:
Hi everyone,

I have quick question about Verdana. (I have asked Microsoft but I didn't get any answer.)

Do somebody know if Verdana have language support for; Chinese, Trad Chines, Japanese, Malay Arabik, and Thai? Any type guru maby?

If you don't know please post suggestions how i can get the answers!

Thank you!

Regards  
Patrick
author: dega

comments.content:
Who did you contact at MS?

Cheers, Si

PS. the answer is no, unless you count Meiryo the Japanese font with "Verdana 2.0" Latins.
